content: About E-bikes are a great way to replace short car trips. But most affordable e-bikes are sold online, so it‚Äôs not always easy to try an e-bike before you buy one. The Charlottesville E-bike Lending Library is a free service that lends out e-bikes for up to a week so you can try an e-bike (or a few) and decide whether you want to get one yourself. Sign up to borrow an e-bike or contact us with any questions.
Our E-bikes RadRunner Plus: Utility e-bike Ride1Up Prodigy: Commuter e-bike RadMission: Single-speed e-bike RadWagon 4: Cargo e-bike (temporarily unavailable)

Eligibility We really don‚Äôt want our e-bikes to get stolen, so you should be able to store one indoors at home, and have a secure place to lock it up if you‚Äôre commuting to work or to school. We‚Äôll provide a lock and show you how to use it. We also use a tracker to help prevent the e-bikes from being stolen. You should be comfortable riding a standard bicycle and familiar with local bicycling rules. If you‚Äôre planning to commute on the e-bike, you should map out a route that you‚Äôll feel safe on. If you need help choosing a route, let us know! E-bikes are generally heavier than standard bikes, and ours weigh between 45 and 75 lb. If you‚Äôll need to carry an e-bike up or down stairs, you might want to try one of our ligher e-bikes.

E-bike discounts If you‚Äôre buying an e-bike online, you can often save at least $50 using a referral code. You can get a code from a friend or use one of ours. If you use ours, we‚Äôll pass any credit we get to another local e-bike buyer. Many brands have referral codes, so if you‚Äôre going to buy an e-bike from a company not listed here, let us know and we‚Äôll set up referrals. Anti-theft stickers We also have a bunch of stickers from Bike Index. You can put a sticker on your bike and register it with Bike Index. If your bike gets stolen, you can notify Bike Index, and potential buyers will be able to figure out that the bike was stolen and should be returned to you. Let us know if you want some stickers!)
